section.title: Summary
section.value:
More than 10 years experience of cross-browser and cross-platform semantic markup (HTML5/CSS3).
Experience on JavaScript/TypeScript/AJAX/GraphQL development with frameworks: Underscore/Lodash, jQuery, AngularJS, BackboneJS, ReactJS/Redux, Apollo GraphQL.
Familiar with implementation methods of interfaces with the responsive/adaptive layout.
Participated in projects with Agile/SCRUM process organization.
Participated in the trips and negotiated with the client during the project requirements analysis.
Team leadership and department management experience, high analytical, communicative and mentoring skills.

value.title: Lead Software Development Engineer
value.value:
Lead Software Development Engineer of UI team of e-commerce platform customization project.
Responsibilities: mentoring and support of junior teammates, negotiating with a customer about new features, analyze and prepare new feature requirements and planning quarter-based scope. Developing requirements for ReactJS/GraphQL-based front-end transformation. Performing of React-based application and Apollo-based GraphQL server for the proof-of-concept.
Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ReactJS, NodeJS), GraphQL; Docker, Kubernetes..
Duration: ongoing
